price: 45. Toen waren zij niet in staat op te staan, noch konden zij zichzelf helpen.
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: famā is'taṭāʿū min qiyāmin wamā kānū muntaṣirīna
